trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati per gli eventi <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated" /> e <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento viene generato quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> creando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised when `DataBind` is called on the item during a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento viene generato quando `DataBind` per l'elemento viene chiamato durante una chiamata a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> that is the source of the event.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs" /> class, setting the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> object as the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs" />, impostando come origine dell'evento l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs> using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> that represents a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator>, and how to pass the event arguments to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs> utilizzando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> che rappresenta un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator>e come passare gli argomenti dell'evento per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio pi√π esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the node item that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento nodo che costituisce l'origine dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> that is the source of the event.
